introduction: SYNOPSISIn-ae who works at a cabaret seduces politicians and millionaires to make a lot of money. She is rich in materialistic sense but wants true love. One day she meets Min-woo who works at a green house to make his living after failing in lawyer exam. She is attracted to his sincerity and devotes herself to help him. They fall in love. She buys off the cabaret and let Min-woo manage it. Min-woo meets Sun-hee who sings at the cabaret and they secretly share love. Min-woo turns down In-ae's proposal but Sun-hee leaves him disappointed by his lies being with In-ae for her money. Later they run into each other at the beach in their home town but Sun-hee coldly avoids him. In-ae kills herself devastated by the failure of her last love and loss of hope and Min-woo regrets his cowardice and grieves for her sad life.故事歌厅前INA使用MIMO eoulrimyeon和政治家，贵族II产生巧妙勒索巨款。物质财富，但她，想要真正的爱情。有一天，伊奈会见了通知普罗克特圣珉宇种植大棚导致了他的朴素和诚实和真实相貌帮助LAPD。在两人一见钟情。INA给人的统治，以珉宇的收购歌舞表演。珉宇在这里会见了新秀歌手阳光是nanumyeonseo暗恋她和INA的甚至拒绝求婚。然而，阳光感到失望的是珉宇虚假的爱金钱和隐藏的痕迹。他们团聚，但阳光ssaneulhi站距离海滩家里回来。同时，伊奈的失落与沮丧的希望和梦想的最后的爱打破了自己的生命。珉宇计算nwiwoochimyeo喜欢感叹自己不幸的一生。
